
{{alias}}( y, x )
    Evaluates the arctangent of the quotient of two numbers.

    Parameters
    ----------
    y: number
        Numerator value.

    x: number
        Denominator value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Arctangent of quotient `y/x` (in radians).

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 2.0, 2.0 )
    ~0.785
    > v = {{alias}}( 6.0, 2.0 )
    ~1.249
    > v = {{alias}}( -1.0, -1.0 )
    ~-2.356
    > v = {{alias}}( 3.0, 0.0 )
    ~1.571
    > v = {{alias}}( -2.0, 0.0 )
    ~-1.571
    > v = {{alias}}( 0.0, 0.0 )
    0.0
    > v = {{alias}}( 3.0, NaN )
    NaN
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN, 2.0 )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
